Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Round

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Round
public class Round extends Object
Class that manages the players turns order during the single match round, and for the only player who has currently the turn, it stores the actions list that he can do. Players' turns order is kept in a circular ArrayList to keep track of the initial order when the Round has ended.

      Sets the new Players turns order
      Parameters:
      newOrder - the list containing the ids of the Players in the new order
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if the new order size doesn't match players number or if a player is present more than once

      Throws:

    • playerTurnEnded

      public boolean playerTurnEnded()
      This method is called from outside when the Player has ended its turn. Increases the number of players that have played in this round (to know then when the Round ends). Shifts the order of play to prepare the next player to be picked. Check if all the players of the round have played; if yes, return false to let outside know the round has ended and a new Player order is required. If after this player, the round ended, the round restarts with the same order.
      Returns:
      false if after the current player there's nobody that has to play next
